channel.title: Stupid v4 client error
channel.description:
I did everything downloaded jdk 6u3 and also tried 6u2 first but then got 6u3. I got the variables and stuff and then when i open silab client v4 it opens and it goes to log in page i type in suddenly i press connect it suddenly closes and says!:::
C:\Documents and Settings\Nemat\My Documents>java -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 h ighmem members 0 RS2 user client - release #317 silabsoft.org # # An unexpected error has been detected by Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_FLT_STACK_CHECK (0xc0000092) at pc=0x0093cea9, pid=2640, tid=2492 # # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (1.6.0_03-b05 mixed mode, sharing) # Problematic frame: # v ~RuntimeStub::resolve_opt_virtual_call # # An error report file with more information is saved as hs_err_pid2640.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #
C:\Documents and Settings\Nemat\My Documents>pause Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Stupid v4 client error
item.dc:creator: @r_s_ownz r s ownz
item.description:
@r_s_ownz wrote:

I installed it
But when i look at recognizing java. it shows a pic in system variables but i cant see complete thing it says … at end i cant c rest and when i look at my system variables it doesnt say classpath - variable (__________________________)[br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2007, 05:41:45 PM[/size][hr]That ULTIMATE MOPARSCAPE GUIDE THING[br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2007, 05:43:07 PM[/size][hr]Now it says this when the client closes

C:\Documents and Settings\Nemat\My Documents>java -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 h
ighmem members 0
RS2 user client - release #317
silabsoft.org

An unexpected error has been detected by Java Runtime Environment:

EXCEPTION_FLT_STACK_CHECK (0xc0000092) at pc=0x0093cea9, pid=2640, tid=2492

Java VM: Java HotSpot™ Client VM (1.6.0_03-b05 mixed mode, sharing)

Problematic frame:

v ~RuntimeStub::resolve_opt_virtual_call

An error report file with more information is saved as hs_err_pid2640.log

If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:

http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp

C:\Documents and Settings\Nemat\My Documents>pause
Press any key to continue . . .

[br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2007, 05:44:45 PM[/size][hr]HELP!!!
